definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
surname Mi/name of an ancient state

sentences.english: The micro-motion mechanism is one of key components of precision machinery and precision instrument.
sentences.chinese: 微位移机构是精密机械和精密仪器的关键部件之一。

sentences.english: Digital continuous clinometer is an accurate device to measure well trajectory .
sentences.chinese: 数字式连续测斜仪是用于测量井身轨迹的精密仪器。

sentences.english: which is called two seventy-five, which is Precision Machine Design.
sentences.chinese: 它的代号为275，全名叫精密仪器设计。

sentences.english: Precision instruments have enhanced the quality of analysis.
sentences.chinese: 精密仪器提高了分西质量。

sentences.english: There are more than 200 well-maintained instruments in the department.
sentences.chinese: 本系所现有二百多台维护精良的精密仪器。

sentences.english: We've arranged for one gang to unload the precision apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经派了一个工组来卸精密仪器。

sentences.english: You must be more than careful with the precision instruments in doing experiments.
sentences.chinese: 做实验时对精密仪器你要十分小心。

sentences.english: "You don't need sophisticated instruments to tell you what is the air quality, " Lu said.
sentences.chinese: “你不需要精密仪器来告诉你空气质量如何，”卢说。

sentences.english: This precision instrument is worth 10,000 yuan.
sentences.chinese: 这台精密仪器价值一万元。

sentences.english: Eye-movement apparatus is a large precision instrument applied to psychological experiment.
sentences.chinese: 眼动仪是用于心理学实验研究的大型精密仪器。

sentences.english: And have advanced precision instruments and testing equipment.
sentences.chinese: 并具有先进的精密仪器和检测设备。

sentences.english: For determining the flammability of plastic material of electric compartment.
sentences.chinese: 测试家电用塑料材料可燃性的精密仪器。

sentences.english: We require the agency in our market for your precision apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 我们要求做贵司精密仪器在我们市场的代理。

sentences.english: Suitable for precision engineers, instrument makers, watch repairers, jewellers etc.
sentences.chinese: 适用于精密仪器制造者，工程师，表店，珠宝店等。

sentences.english: Because computers are precise instruments, they are not designed to think randomly.
sentences.chinese: 因为电脑是精密仪器，用电脑选号随机性不强。

sentences.english: Some precision gages used a thermal compensator.
sentences.chinese: 有些精密仪器用了热补偿器。

definition: computer numerical control machine tool (CNC machine tool)
